justification: “Participants rated their agreement with 12 items measuring attitudes towards forensic issues… A total score was created… Higher scores indicated more pro-prosecution leanings.”

“Participants completed a defendant evaluation questionnaire… rated four statements pertaining to the defendant’s meeting of criteria for criminal responsibility… We combined five items into a composite responsibility variable.”
“Participants completed the dissonance measure at the end of each phase… The measure consists of 24 items… We created the composite measure of discomfort using the same subset of three items.”

“After completing the expert reports, we asked participants to complete a report satisfaction questionnaire… Participants rated their satisfaction with the expert report, how closely the report reflects their case opinion, and the objectivity of the report.”

“We asked all experts to complete a testimony satisfaction questionnaire following their testimony… Participants rated their satisfaction with the process, their objectivity, the value of their testimony, their effectiveness, and their enjoyment.”

topic_or_construct: perception of opposing expert bias and effectiveness
justification: “After completing the testimony satisfaction questionnaire, experts in the concurrent condition rated the expert they opposed… 15 statements about the expert's qualifications, level of bias, effectiveness, respectfulness, and testimony clarity.”
